name: Magic and Blade
description:
Choose from 4 classes to battle various enemies to survive.

Grow your character with points and funds rewarded.

You can research your character's skill card according to your desired strategy.

Defeat enemies with skill cards in turn-based combat.

 

Character classes

- Knight

           Swords and shields can be used for melee attacks or defensive attacks.

- Archer

           Archer can use the bow to play long ranged attacks.

- Cleric

           Cleric can use skills to cure allies.

- Socerer

           Socerer Use powerful magic attack skills.
